statements: UPDATE security_incidents SET resolution = 'Fixed', resolved_by = 'John Doe' WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE security_incidents SET resolved_by = 'Jane Smith', vulnerability_detected = TRUE WHERE incident_id = 2;
UPDATE security_incidents SET resolution = 'Fixed', resolved_by = 'John Doe', vulnerability_detected = false WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE security_incidents SET resolved_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', incident_type = 'Data Breach' WHERE incident_id = 3;
UPDATE SecurityIncidents SET incident_description = 'Theft reported', severity_level = 3 WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE IncidentResolutions SET resolved_by = 'John Doe', resolved_date = '2022-05-20 09:30:00' WHERE incident_id = 102;
UPDATE SecurityIncidents SET incident_description = 'Data Breach Incident', severity_level = 5 WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE IncidentResolutions SET resolution_description = 'Resolved with system patch', resolved_by = 'IT Security Team' WHERE resolution_id = 3;
UPDATE security_incidents SET description = 'Updated description for incident 1001' WHERE incident_id = 1001;
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_details = 'Resolved by updating resolution details' WHERE resolution_id = 2001;
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity = 5, description = 'Critical security vulnerability identified' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_status = 'Closed', resolution_details = 'Implemented security patch' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE security_incidents SET incident_description = 'Unauthorized access attempt' WHERE incident_id = 101
UPDATE incident_analysis SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', analysis_description = 'Initial investigation completed' WHERE incident_id = 102
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity_level = 3 WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE incident_resolutions SET resolution = 'Resolved the issue' WHERE incident_id = 102 AND resolution_id = 201;
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity = 5 WHERE incident_id = 12345;
UPDATE incident_resolutions SET resolution_status = 'Closed' WHERE resolution_id = 54321;
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity = 3, location = 'Office Building A' WHERE incident_id = 1024;
UPDATE incident_resolutions SET resolution_status = 'Closed', resolution_details = 'Resolved the issue' WHERE incident_id = 2050;
